name: HomegearGpio::setEdge
shortDescription: Sets the edge of a GPIO to generate interrupts for.
description: This method sets the edge of a GPIO to generate interrupts for. Before calling this method, the GPIO needs to be opened with HomegearGpio::open().

parameters.name: edge
parameters.description: The edge to generate interrupts for. Possible values are HomegearGpio::EDGE_RISING (0), HomegearGpio::EDGE_FALLING (1) and HomegearGpio::EDGE_BOTH (2).
